--- Page 1 (pdf_text) ---
Centre for Military Airworthiness and Certification
FORM - 44
DEFECT INVESTIGATION REPORT FORMAT
In accordance with IMTAR – 21, Subpart C1, 21.C1.18, Subpart C2, 21.C2.9 & Subpart C3, 21.C3.1.20.
Part - I (Reference): Incident /Accident/ Snag / Explosive
a) Defect Report (DR) No: DR/2023/0741 b) Date of Occurrence: 30/09/2024
c) Installation Details: Goliath Lift - AC-5468-604 at Zone-4
Facility
Part - II: (Details of Defective Component)
a) Trade: Propulsion b) Date Component 07/10/2024
Received:
c) System/Sub System: Engine Control d) Main Assembly: Pylon-B
e) Nomenclature: Engine Control Assembly Unit f) MOD Status: Modified
g) Part No.: PR-9179-W9 h) Sl No.: SN-2430-828
i) Firmware Version: Not Applicable j) Software Version: Not Applicable
k) Date of Installation: 11/09/2022 l) Date of Removal: 06/10/2024
Pg No: 1 Ln No: 19 Pg No: 27 Ln No: 23
m) Manufacturing Agency: Advanced Flight Technologies n) Date, Month & Year September 2015
of Manufacturing:
o) Whether under warranty: Yes p) Whether under AMC Yes
/ Repair Contract:
q) Life completed since New: 2078 Hrs / 1084 Cycles

--- Page 2 (pdf_text) ---
Centre for Military Airworthiness and Certification
FORM - 44
DEFECT INVESTIGATION REPORT FORMAT
Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Observation
b) Defect Observed: Fuel nozzle blockage. Anomaly detected during routine inspection.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Wear beyond serviceable limits due to extended operational hours
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Engine Control component. Inspection
revealed damage to critical components.
c) Remedial Measures Conduct non-destructive testing to verify structural integrity
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Implement quality control check at manufacturing stage
d) Attributable Code: N2 - Defect Not Confirmed
Remarks: Comprehensive analysis performed. Root cause identified and verified.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Design assessment confirms component operated within specified limits. Recommend enhanced inspection protocol.
Date: 04/11/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Eng. K.N. Iyer

--- Page 3 (pdf_text) ---
Centre for Military Airworthiness and Certification
FORM - 44
DEFECT INVESTIGATION REPORT FORMAT
Part VI: Remarks by Quality Dept.
Quality aspects reviewed. Manufacturing process controls are adequate. Recommend supplier quality audit.
Date: 06/11/2024 Signature: Eng. K.N. Iyer
Part VII: Remarks by User(Project):(if applicable)
Operational usage reviewed. Component operated within prescribed limits. Concur with investigation outcome.
Date: 06/11/2024 Signature: Sqn Ldr H.S. Bhatia
Part VIII: Remarks by ORDAQA (Quality Aspects)
Quality oversight review completed. Recommend monitoring effectiveness of implemented preventive actions.
Date: 08/11/2024 Signature: Eng. T.R. Menon
Part IX: Remarks by CEMILAC / RCMA (Design Aspects)
Certification review completed. Proposed modifications do not affect type design approval. Acceptable.
Date: 11/11/2024 Signature: Sqn Ldr A.R. Desai
Edition Number: 1.0 Form Version Number: 1.0 Date: January 2021
